name: An opalescent talon (1h)
data: It has good weapon class for its type (low in general).
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It does magical damage a good amount.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'channel life'.
The hollow shaft of the talon is an ideal conduit for channeling energy.
